price: Obiara ntumi mmisa no wͻ deε Ɔyε ho asεm, na wͻn deε yεbebisa wͻn.
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
